name: Ogre, Kadag
description: The Kadag Ogre is a large, intimidating giant with a fearsome presence, notable for its muscular build and ruthless demeanor.
memorable: Its ability to poison nearby creatures and command undead allies makes it a unique and dangerous opponent in battle.
goals: Seeks to dominate undead and exert power over living creatures.
relations: Often found in the company of undead minions, such as skeletons and zombies.
environment: Typically resides in desolate, grim areas where it can command the undead.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength allows for devastating melee attacks; resistant to certain damage types.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and Charisma limits maneuverability and social interaction.
attacks: Multiattack with three spear strikes, dealing considerable piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Scent of Death ability poisons nearby creatures, significantly hampering their combat effectiveness.
senses: Has a passive perception of 16, indicating a good level of awareness.
skills: Proficient in perception, giving it an average awareness in its surroundings.
additional_information: Resistances to necrotic damage and piercing from nonmagical attacks
Grants temporary hit points to undead allies
Disadvantage for undead attacking it if it hasn't engaged them recently
Specializes in influencing both living beings and undead
test_queries: powerful melee ogre that poisons enemies
large giant resistant to necrotic damage
